title: [PSP] The Simpsons Game [ISO]
description:
View full description at http://www.ea.com/simpsons


!!!!!!!All Noobs Please Read This!!!!!!!!!-
  To Run this you need a PSP On Custom Firmware, Not the kind from SONY.
  To Obtain Custom Firmware you must(works on both Phat and Slim):


  1) Get a Pandora's battery (I got mine from http://pandorasales.com/pabaon.html)
  
  2) Get A memory Stick Less Than or equal to 4gigs and turn it into a magic
     Memory stick By using despertar del cementario 8
     (Follow the README.TXT inside of it)

  3) If You are using a theme then close it and put the original back

  4) Shut down the PSP by holding the R button while shutting down
 
  5) Insert the Magic Memory Stick into the PSP and then the Battery

  6) Install the 5.00 regular Firmware first and then 5.00 m33

  7) Shut down the PSP by holding the R button while shutting down

  8) Put the Regular Battery Back into the PSP And Boot

  9) And If you Check your system settings it should say you're running firmware
     5.00 m33-4
  
  10) If nothing shows up then you bricked it so you need to shutdown (with the R
      Trigger) and Hold the R Trigger while booting up. You know should be in the
      Recovery Menu so know you can install something else for the magic memory
      Stick And repeat steps 3-9

 For further help go to any PSP Hacking Website or visit Dark-Alex's PSP Wiki
  Located At http://alek.dark-alex.org/pspwiki/index.php/Main_Page


  ******I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BRICKED PSPs*******
